name: Paul Salter
text: We bought a new home and needed a new pitched roof and a new flat roof. Nathan and Ben are hardworking, going above and beyond to make sure our home was safe and protected. They resolved bigger issues with the flat roof so it now fully protects our home. We cannot thank them enough. Both roofs look amazing — the best looking in the street. Reliable, clean, kept us updated with videos/photos so we were aware of all stages of the roof replacement. 10/10 thank you!!

name: Dan Hadley
text: Highly recommend Nathan and Ben, they fitted a new complete wet room — thank you guys.

name: Arron Rawson
text: 100 Percent this company! I’ve had Nathan working for me for the past decade and he gets better and better, always trying to make his work that extra bit better!

name: Jason Hulbert
text: Brilliant experience with this company. Highly recommended at brilliant prices.

name: Maria Davies
text: Had Ben to put a TV on the wall.

name: Julie Smith
text: Ben Price came to my property and worked on my satellite dish. Very helpful and polite — would definitely use again.

name: Martyn Evans
text: Great service, very friendly — wouldn’t hesitate to recommend.

name: Mary Woowoo
text: Great job, decent price, did as I asked — would definitely recommend.
